db:abstract.db:para: Defines scripts to be run during an animation.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: ScriptAction can be used to run a script at a specific point in an animation.
When used as part of a Transition, you can also target a specific StateChangeScript to run using the scriptName property.

db:section.db:title: script : script
db:section.db:para: This property holds the script to run.

db:section.db:title: scriptName : string
db:section.db:para: This property holds the name of the StateChangeScript to run.
This property is only valid when ScriptAction is used as part of a transition. If both script and scriptName are set, scriptName will be used.

db:note.db:para: When using scriptName in a reversible transition, the script will only be run when the transition is being run forwards.
